name: Dungeon Merchant (Owl_SeeYouLater - Ashley (they/them), marhot, luceCoding, Rabro, theKatiest, scriptorious, Clau_LH, ColdGhost, ristana)
name_original: Dungeon Merchant (Owl_SeeYouLater - Ashley (they/them), marhot, luceCoding, Rabro, theKatiest, scriptorious, Clau_LH, ColdGhost, ristana)
description:
The shop doors are open, the adventurers are ready to dungeon crawl and you? You're ready to make enough gold to finally pay off your student loans!

Craft and sell items for adventurers so they can venture forth into the dungeon, and earn piles of gold! But be quick: the debt collectors are closing in, and they're scarier than any goblin or lich!

Made for the 2022 Seattle Indies Slow Jam.

The Team
